title: How to Evolve Cubone in Pokémon Sun and Moon

steps.title: Identify where Cubone can be found.
steps.content: Identify where Cubone can be found. It can be found in the bottom area of Wela Volcano Park. You have a 24% chance of finding one at any time of day. It'll be between level 16 and 19.

steps.title: Go to the bottom area of Wela Volcano Park.
steps.content: Go to the bottom area of Wela Volcano Park. Go through the tall grass until you find a Cubone.

steps.title: Catch the Cubone.
steps.content: Catch the Cubone. Nest Balls are a good ball to catch it with, since they work well on low-level Pokémon.

steps.title: Make sure you're playing when it's nighttime in-game.
steps.content: Make sure you're playing when it's nighttime in-game. Cubone caught in Alola will only evolve during the nighttime. In Pokémon Sun, the in-game clock matches your console's clock, while in Pokémon Moon, the in-game clock is 12 hours ahead of your console's clock. So if you have Pokémon Moon, make sure you're playing during the daytime, not the nighttime.

steps.title: Have your Cubone gain experience.
steps.content: Have your Cubone gain experience. Since Cubone is a Ground-type Pokémon, the best Pokémon to face are Electric, Ground, Steel, and Rock-type Pokémon.

steps.title: Keep leveling up your Cubone.
steps.content: Keep leveling up your Cubone. When Cubone reaches level 28, it will evolve into Marowak.
